snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average closed down after flirting with a record high for much of the afternoon.
abstract: Stocks end flat, giving up modest gains late in the session and denying the Dow a chance to inch closer to record high.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average closed down after flirting with a record high for much of the afternoon.

headline.seo: After a Sturdy Start, Markets Fall Back
headline.main: After a Tease, Stocks End Lower
headline.print_headline: After a Sturdy Start, The Market Falls Back
